name: Garlic Balsamic Shrimp
author: Felicia Manocchio
summary: Shrimp in a balsamic vinegar marinade, cooked with onions and peppers on a pan grill.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds large shrimp, peeled and deveined
1  red bell pepper, cut into large chunks
directions: In a large bowl, mix the vinegar, oil, garlic, basil, salt, and ground pepper
Place the shrimp, bell pepper, and onion in the bowl, and gently toss to coat
Cover, and allow to marinate at least 20 minutes in the refrigerator
Heat a pan grill over high heat
Alternately thread the shrimp, onion chunks, and pepper chunks on skewers
Place skewers on the pan grill, and cook 2 to 3 minutes per side, until shrimp is opaque
